Coolhouse Labs (http://coolhouselabs.com/) - Harbor Springs, MI - Summer (Jun-Aug) Contract

Coolhouse Labs is an early stage tech startup accelerator + venture fund founded on the shores of Lake Michigan. Kinda like summer camp for startups, but with less bug bites. We run two programs each year - Summer Camp for Startups in Northern Michigan, and Winters in Ann Arbor.

We're hiring 6 designers (4 mid/senior, 2 entry/intern) to come work with our portfolio companies this summer. You'll be working in a very fast paced environment helping teams iterate on web/mobile app product designs, marketing collateral, and company brands.

If interested, please email blake@coolhouselabs.com with a brief intro and link to your portfolio.

Come build something awesome with us this summer!
